title: [Large-scale] Integrating Digital Media and Sustainability: TPACK-Based Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of educational technology and project management experience
context.additional_context: A course focused on strengthening sustainable digital media utilization skills in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can establish digital media integration strategies considering ecological, economic, and social sustainability by applying the TPACK model.
Learners can evaluate three media types—virtual field trips (VFR), smartboards, and interactive AI tools—from a sustainability perspective.
Learners can design smartphone-based projects in limited-technology environments to propose solutions for bridging the digital divide and enhancing educational accessibility.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
